sbbox2 <- make_bbox(
	lon = c(min(occ$LONGITUDE_X) - 25, max(occ$LONGITUDE_X)) + 25,
	lat = c(min(occ$LATITUDE_Y)-2, max(occ$LATITUDE_Y))+2,
	f = 0.5)

# CrÃ©ation de la carte vide
southamerica2 <- get_map(location = sbbox2, zoom = 4, maptype = "terrain")

# Ajout du rectangle rouge
xy <-
	data.frame(
		x = c(
			min(occ$LONGITUDE_X) - 2,
			min(occ$LONGITUDE_X) - 2,
			max(occ$LONGITUDE_X) + 3,
			max(occ$LONGITUDE_X) + 3,
			min(occ$LONGITUDE_X) - 2
		),
		y = c(
			max(occ$LATITUDE_Y),
			min(occ$LATITUDE_Y),
			min(occ$LATITUDE_Y),
			max(occ$LATITUDE_Y),
			max(occ$LATITUDE_Y)
		)
	)

p2 <- ggmap(southamerica2) + 
	geom_path(data = xy,
						aes(x, y),
						color = "#B3343D",
						lwd = 1) +
	theme_void() +
	theme (
		axis.text.x = element_blank(),
		axis.text.y = element_blank(),
		axis.title.x = element_blank(),
		axis.title.y = element_blank(),
		axis.line.x = element_blank(),
		axis.line.y = element_blank()
	)
p2
